title: Hiveon Pool issue - No stats appearing
text:
There's an issue with some Hiveon users where no stats are being displayed. The fix will come in the next version (1.4.1).

You don't need to wait though, you can fix it yourself right now by using your wallet with only lowercased letters, like this:

0xd8fEBBFF96b4b28360126A817E8715e0398E4C63

lowercased:
0xd8febbff96b4b28360126a817e8715e0398e4c63

title: T-Rex Miner 100% LHR Unlock
text:
Nvidia miners rejoice! T-Rex miner 0.26.1 was officially released with 100% LHR unlock for most LHR cards (except RTX 3080 12GB and RTX 3050).

If you're a HiveOS user and want to update you need to:

1) Update your HiveOS to the latest version
2) Unset your Flight Sheet
3) Update your Nvidia drivers to 510.xx (you can run the nvidia-driver-update command)
4) Edit your Flight Sheet, click on 'Setup Miner Config' over T-Rex Miner and select version 0.26.1, then click on Apply Changes
5) Reboot
6) Set your Flight Sheet again
7) Enjoy!

 For Windows users:

1) Update your Nvidia driver to 512.xx
2) Install T-Rex 0.26.1
3) Reboot
4) Start mining again and enjoy!

title: What I'm working on
text: I'm currently working on a very requested feature: dual mining on Ezil pool! Stay tuned!

title: What's new in version 1.4.0
text:
Hashrate now supports Alephium through HeroMiners pool! This update also brings the following improvements:
